metadata.title: EC-Council CHFI v11 CHFI Practice Questions

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Computer Forensics & Investigation Process (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Expert Witness Testimony is a key concept in Computer Forensics & Investigation Process. This domain covers topics essential for the EC-Council CHFI v11 exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with apply legal and ethical considerations in digital investigations. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any computer forensics & investigation process task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Computer Forensics & Investigation Process is most closely related to establish and maintain chain of custody for digital evidence?
options: Computer Forensics & Investigation Process governance and oversight
Computer Forensics & Investigation Process implementation and operations
Computer Forensics & Investigation Process assessment and testing
Computer Forensics & Investigation Process risk management
questions.explanation: Establish and maintain chain of custody for digital evidence falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Computer Forensics & Investigation Process.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Computer Forensics & Investigation Process (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: First Responder Procedures is a key concept in Computer Forensics & Investigation Process. This domain covers topics essential for the EC-Council CHFI v11 exam.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key consideration when working with understand computer forensics fundamentals and investigation methodology?
options: Following industry best practices and standards
Reducing the number of team members involved
questions.explanation: When working with understand computer forensics fundamentals and investigation methodology, following industry best practices ensures consistent and reliable results.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the purpose of "Apply legal and ethical considerations in digital investigations" in Computer Forensics & Investigation Process?
options: To implement and manage apply legal and ethical considerations in digital investigations processes
To evaluate compliance with computer forensics & investigation process standards
questions.explanation: Apply legal and ethical considerations in digital investigations is a key objective in Computer Forensics & Investigation Process. Understanding this concept is essential for the exam.
